title: Market Survey Automation
prefeaturesdescription: EffortlessMarketSurvey is a powerful real estate web scraper that automates market surveys by collecting data from apartments.com.
features: Parallel data processing to handle multiple property surveys simultaneously
Automatic Chromedriver updates for seamless operation
Easy input customization from JSON and CSV
PowerBI Templates for out-of-box data visualization
postfeaturesdescription: EffortlessMarketSurvey streamlines competitor analysis, making it more efficient, effective, and a lot less of a hassle.
